nodes.text: A Trade Federation prison camp was established on the Solleu River on the planet Naboo after the corporation launched an invasion in 32 BBY. The camp was near a waterfall on the river and its three main buildings were set up on islands. Its defenses consisted of turret droids and a flotilla of Patrol Boats and Single Trooper Aerial Platforms patrolled the area. A pylon with a deflector shield generator blocked access to further down the river. The camp was raided and its prisoners freed by members of the Naboo Resistance.
The prison camp appears in the twelfth mission of the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter.
